thread.title: From WSJ.D: Before Taking Your Job, a Robot May Work Next to You
thread.title_full: From WSJ.D: Before Taking Your Job, a Robot May Work Next to You - WSJ

author: Elizabeth Dwoskin
title: From WSJ.D: Before Taking Your Job, a Robot May Work Next to You
text:
Before a robot takes your job, you’re likely to be working with one side-by-side. That’s the takeaway from a new report by Forrester Research Inc. examining to what extent robots will take over human jobs.
Looking at workforces at large companies like Delta Airlines, Whole Foods Market, and Lowe’s Companies, as well as at startups, analyst J.P. Gownder estimated automation would erase 22.7 million U.S. jobs by 2025, or 16% of today’s...
